lithium.community.android.sdk.api

Class LiBasePostClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • lithium.community.android.sdk.api.LiBasePostClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LiClient

    public class LiBasePostClient
extends java.lang.Object
    All "post" clients are implemented in same way. They only vary in their requestBody. This class brings all the common codes together and provide a layer of abstraction to all of the "post" clients. Created by kunal.shrivastava on 10/19/16.
